response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth to both parties, I propose a transaction price of $1,300,000. This amount reflects a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and your perceived worth, aiming to ensure a mutually beneficial outcome. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can reach an agreement that satisfies all aspects of this transaction.", "product_price": 1300000}
